thread.title: BRIEF-Guangdong Hongteo Accurate Technology proposes FY 2017 dividend payment

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Guangdong Hongteo Accurate Technology proposes FY 2017 dividend payment

organizations.name: guangdong hongteo accurate technology co ltd

text:
Feb 28(Reuters) - Guangdong Hongteo Accurate Technology Co Ltd :
* Actual controller proposed to pay a cash dividend of 10 yuan for every 10 shares, and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 15 new shares for every 10 shares, as the dividend payment plan for FY 2017
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/762Pxd
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
